nile.desc: Dive into the vision of NILE with NFT art pieces.

lus.desc: Check out 264 pieces that connect viewers to nostalgic places in England.

tangled.desc: Tangled is a web3 live community app where users can directly form new communities and communicate with one another.

ranking.title: Ranking
ranking.notice: Settled in order of the biggest number of transactions that occurred in a given period
ranking.notice2: Settled in order of the most expensive latest sale price

bottom.title: NFT is for Everyone
bottom.notice:
There are various categories of NFTs in the NILE Marketplace.
 Send us an enquiry if you want to work with NILE.

listing.txt: When this piece is sold for the price above, you will be getting this much as profits for this sale, excluding the fees shown below.

detail.auction: If there are no additional bids, the auction will end at 2022.03.02 17:00 KST.

snkrzInfo: The SNKRZ Details page will be available from November 17th.
